group.label: Define Coupon X Get Y Free/Discounted Products and Criteria

field.comment: This extension can create a sales promotion, where a bonus product Y is added to the cart if the customer applies a promotional coupon code. Please ensure your product Y is a simple product.

field.label: Product Y Product ID:
field.comment: ID number of product Y (bonus product) Product Y must be a simple product and the ID configured here must be unique.

field.label: Coupon required to qualify for Product Y:
field.comment: Name of the coupon required required to qualify for product Y. Coupon must be valid and configured in Magento under Promotions.

field.label: Skus of children products
field.comment: Simple Products asscoiated to configurable products. Used with the Rule "Buy X and Y get Z free (Z is a configurable product)". Separated by ,
